jdbcService.sql: select id, definition_id, parent_id, batch_id, context_id, group_id, correlation_id, workflow_type, uri, started, stopped, environment, transition_state, state_id from workflow_instances $join where state_id = :stateId and definition_id = :definitionId and (:from is null or started > :from) and (:until is null or started <= :until) $where order by started desc
